thread.section_title: Ruby Lane Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ruby Lane | www.rubylane.com
thread.title: Peter Trist
thread.title_full: Ruby Lane reviewed by Peter Trist

author: Peter Trist
title: Peter Trist
text: I have found Ruby Lane to be accessible for jewellery although it would be a good idea to have a NO Purchase period of say a week to enable visitors to the site to become aware of the existence of a particular item. I have several times seen an item which I would have wanted to buy but it had been already bought by someone who spends a lot of time checking the site. I live in Australia in a different time zone to USA and Europe so am asleep when most items are loaded onto the system.
